introduction: My name is Matěj Holman. I am a {{age}} year old computer science student originally from Liberec. I currently live and study in Prague.
aboutText: I have an education background in IT and a few months experience in the field but I am constantly open to learning new things. My main programming languages are <u>C#</u> and <u>Javascript</u> but I don't shy away from others like <u>Python</u> or <u>SQL</u>. I extensively use <u>React</u> and <u>React Native</u> and I am familiar with <u>ASP.NET</u> too. I have a certified <u>C1</u> level of English.
school: Secondary Technical School and Higher Vocational School, Liberec
uni: University of Economics, Faculty of Informatics and Statistics, Prague
job1Description: Company internship, assistance in the IT department
job2Description: Implementation of web application designs for company clients, front end design
project1Description: A meal planning app for easier nutrition overview and achieving weight goals, React Native and Expo
project2Description: Front end website designs I did for Kassua studio, HTML, CSS and Javascript
project3Description: Web application for uploading and viewing images from different users, ASP.NET, C#
